alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 1:46PM CST until January 12 at 6:00AM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM CST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT THURSDAY NIGHT TO NOON CST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. For the Wind Chill Watch, dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. * WHERE...Eastern Cherry County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from midnight tonight to 6 AM CST Friday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight Thursday night to noon CST Friday. For the Wind Chill Watch, from Friday evening through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.
